name: Satori
summary: Satori log file processing pipeline and rules

source.@value:
pipeline "satori"
stage 0 match either
rule "process_when_message_contains_DHCP"
rule "process_when_message_contains_TCP"
rule "process_when_message_contains_SERVER"
rule "process_when_message_contains_USERAGENT"
rule "process_when_message_contains_SMBNATIVE_NativeLanMan"
rule "process_when_message_contains_SMBNATIVE_NativeOS"
stage 1 match either
rule "convert_timestamp_from_log"
end

rule "process_when_message_contains_SMBNATIVE_NativeOS"
when
  has_field("message") AND contains(to_string($message.message), ";SMBNATIVE;NativeOS")
then
  let extract = grok(pattern: "%{DATA:timestamp_remote};%{IPV4:src_ip};%{COMMONMAC:src_mac};%{DATA:test_type};%{DATA:native_name};%{GREEDYDATA:os_guess}" , value: to_string($message.message), only_named_captures: true);
  set_fields(extract);
end

rule "process_when_message_contains_TCP"
when
  has_field("message") AND contains(to_string($message.message), ";TCP;")
then
  let extract = grok(pattern: "%{DATA:timestamp_remote};%{IPV4:src_ip};%{COMMONMAC:src_mac};%{DATA:test_type};%{DATA:tcp_flags};%{DATA:tcp_signature};%{GREEDYDATA:os_guess}" , value: to_string($message.message), only_named_captures: true);
  set_fields(extract);
end

rule "process_when_message_contains_SERVER"
when
  has_field("message") AND contains(to_string($message.message), ";SERVER;")
then
  let extract = grok(pattern: "%{DATA:timestamp_remote};%{IPV4:src_ip};%{COMMONMAC:src_mac};%{DATA:test_type};%{DATA:web_server};%{GREEDYDATA:os_guess}" , value: to_string($message.message), only_named_captures: true);
  set_fields(extract);
end

rule "process_when_message_contains_SMBNATIVE_NativeLanMan"
when
  has_field("message") AND contains(to_string($message.message), ";SMBNATIVE;NativeLanMan")
then
  let extract = grok(pattern: "%{DATA:timestamp_remote};%{IPV4:src_ip};%{COMMONMAC:src_mac};%{DATA:test_type};%{DATA:native_lanman};%{GREEDYDATA:os_guess}" , value: to_string($message.message), only_named_captures: true);
  set_fields(extract);
end

rule "process_when_message_contains_DHCP"
when
  has_field("message") AND contains(to_string($message.message), ";DHCP;")
then
  let extract = grok(pattern: "%{DATA:timestamp_remote};%{IPV4:src_ip};%{COMMONMAC:src_mac};%{DATA:test_type};%{DATA:dhcp_message_type};%{DATA:dhcp_field_value};%{GREEDYDATA:os_guess}" , value: to_string($message.message), only_named_captures: true);
  set_fields(extract);
end

rule "process_when_message_contains_USERAGENT"
when
  has_field("message") AND contains(to_string($message.message), ";USERAGENT;")
then
  let extract = grok(pattern: "%{DATA:timestamp_remote};%{IPV4:src_ip};%{COMMONMAC:src_mac};%{DATA:test_type};%{DATA:useragent};%{GREEDYDATA:os_guess}" , value: to_string($message.message), only_named_captures: true);
  set_fields(extract);
end
